live_updates: This issue has now been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are working hard to resolve this issue as soon as possible.
29445.summary: Some customers in Lethbridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
29445.title: Nov 21 - Lethbridge | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
